globals.title: GetQuorum: Electronic Proxy and Voting for Condo Owner Meetings
globals.description: Meeting Quorum and Passing Bylaws Just Got Easier. We provide electronic proxy and online voting solutions for condominium owner meetings.
globals.uvp: Meeing Quorum and Passing Bylaws Just Got Easier
globals.headline: Increase owner representation at meetings with our electronic proxy and solicitation solutions.
